extension.name: Events Booking - Assign Checked In Registrants To User Groups
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This plugin is used to assign users to Joomla Groups when they subscribe to a Event in Event Booking

field.name: default_user_groups
field.label: Default User Groups
field.description: If you select default user groups here, registrants will be assigned to these default user groups if user groups is not setup for that event

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend event submission form
